name.en: Generative Artificial Intelligence and Python Programming for Interdisciplinary Applications
name.ch: 生成式人工智慧與Python程式設計跨域應用

notice.ch: 本課程配合Xplorer計畫開設，限文院、客院、管理學院準大一生。

remark.ch: 本課程配合Xplorer計畫開設，限文院、客院、管理學院準大一生。

goal.ch:
1. Python程式設計
2. Python第三方函式庫

outline.ch:
1、課程簡介、Python簡介、Github操作教學(1)
2、認識變數與基本數學運算、Github操作教學(2)
3、Python數值資料型態、Python運算子、隨機分配學習小組、Github操作教學(3)
4、Python文字資料型態與成員運算子、基本輸入與輸出
5、程式的流程控制-條件判斷、程式的流程控制-迴圈
6、串列(List)、元組(Tuple)
7、字典(Dict)
8、集合(Set)
9、期中考
10、函數(Function)設計
11、函數(Function)引數
12、匿名函數與變數可見度
13、模組(Module)設計與使用
14、檔案的讀寫與組織管理
15、異常處理
16、期末考
17、期末個人跨領域專題
18、期末個人跨領域專題
======
注意事項：
1. 本課程為英文教材
2. 課程Github repository：https://github.com/NCU-GS4719-Python/1111-python-programming，開學後此Github repository將設為private，並以學校email帳號邀請修課同學加入此repository
3. 課程Github community討論區：https://github.com/NCU-GS4719-Python/Python-Community/discussions，本Community將持續公開
4. 修課同學需隨時留意Github的課程訊息公告並配合線上練習與相關作業要求，部分課程內容與學習指引可能隨時做滾動式調整
5. 教材瀏覽、作業繳交、互動討論、分組討論均透過Github管理，修課同學需註冊Github免費會員並使用Github參與課程討論
6. 有筆電的同學可自備筆電上課，亦可使用電腦教室電腦完成各項作業
7. 為即時了解同學線上學習情形，本課程有收集修課同學線上學習記錄分析研究之必要
8. 尊重智慧財產權，使用網路多媒體素材需經過授權
outline.en:
### Course Schedule
1. **Course Introduction, Python Overview, GitHub Tutorial (1)**
2. **Understanding Variables and Basic Mathematical Operations, GitHub Tutorial (2)**
3. **Python Numeric Data Types, Python Operators, Random Group Assignments, GitHub Tutorial (3)**
4. **Python String Data Types and Membership Operators, Basic Input and Output**
5. **Control Flow in Programs - Conditional Statements, Control Flow in Programs - Loops**
6. **Lists**
7. **Dictionaries**
8. **Sets**
9. **Midterm Exam**
10. **Function Design**
11. **Function Arguments**
12. **Anonymous Functions and Variable Scope**
13. **Module Design and Usage**
14. **File Reading, Writing, and Organization Management**
15. **Exception Handling**
16. **Final Exam**
17. **Final Cross-Disciplinary Individual Project**
18. **Final Cross-Disciplinary Individual Project**
### Notes:
1. This course uses English materials.
2. Course GitHub repository: [https://github.com/NCU-GS4719-Python/1111-python-programming](https://github.com/NCU-GS4719-Python/1111-python-programming). This repository will be set to private after the start of the semester, and students will be invited to join using their school email accounts.
3. Course GitHub community discussion area: [https://github.com/NCU-GS4719-Python/Python-Community/discussions](https://github.com/NCU-GS4719-Python/Python-Community/discussions). This community will remain public.
4. Students must stay updated with course announcements on GitHub and comply with online practice and assignment requirements. Some course content and learning guides may be adjusted dynamically.
5. Course materials, assignments, interactive discussions, and group discussions will be managed through GitHub. Students are required to register for a free GitHub account and use GitHub for course discussions.
6. Students with laptops are encouraged to bring them to class; alternatively, classroom computers can be used to complete assignments.
7. To understand students‘ online learning situations in real-time, this course will collect and analyze students‘ online learning records as necessary.
8. Respect intellectual property rights. Use of online multimedia materials requires authorization.

textbook.ch: 1. 精通 Python：運用簡單的套件進行現代運算(第二版) (ISBN: 9789865024864)
textbook.en:
**Introducing Python: Modern Computing in Simple Packages (2nd Edition)**
   - ISBN: 9789865024864

gradMethod.ch:
1. 期中考：40％
2. 期末個人專題：30％
3. AI口試：10％
4. 學習歷程(Github Discussion線上互動討論)：10％
5. 習題作業：10％
gradMethod.en:
### Grading Criteria

1. **Midterm Exam:** 40％
2. **Final Individual Project:** 30％
3. **AI Oral Exam:** 10％
4. **Learning Journey (GitHub Discussion Online Interaction):** 10％
5. **Exercises:** 10％
